prodpage.title: ../img/devmind.png
prodpage.subtitle: IDE inteligente para poupar tempo e dor de cabeça
prodpage.forwhom: Developers who want to program anywhere
prodpage.whatis: An on-line IDE that integrates with user repositories and provides users development environment anywhere
prodpage.innovate: Allows users to work collaboratively in real-time, minimizing code conflicts, and increasing development productivity

prodpage.title: ../img/rtrna.png
prodpage.subtitle: IDE inteligente para poupar tempo e dor de cabeça
prodpage.forwhom: Companies who want to promote your brand through recycling campaigns
prodpage.whatis: Collector machines that aim to be a mean of reverse logistics of post consumer packaging, such as PET bottles, aluminum cans, long life, glass, among others
prodpage.innovate: Identifies the depositor and grants them social benefits, in addition to making donations to Philanthropic Institutions

prodpage.title: ../img/easyodonto.png
prodpage.subtitle: Has never been so easy to take care of your patients
prodpage.forwhom: Dentists who attend hospitals and clinics
prodpage.whatis: A web platform to monitor dental care and generate a wide range of reports on patients
prodpage.innovate: Keeps track on patient's medical record and uses inference algorithms to inform the dentist of possible urgente situations
